doc:
Maurice Benard https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Maurice_Benard 0 Maurice Benard (born March 1, 1963) is an American actor. He is known primarily for his portrayal of Michael "Sonny" Corinthos Jr. on ABC soap opera, General Hospital, a role he has portrayed since 1993. Maurice_Benard ( born March_1_,_1963 ) is an_American_actor . He is_known primarily for his_portrayal of Michael_"_Sonny_"_Corinthos_Jr. on ABC_soap_opera , General_Hospital , a_role he has_portrayed since 1993 .
